name: pilot1_hsjd_simple
title: Feature set for AICCELERATE Pilot 1 for predicting length of stay and complications after the surgery
description: Feature set for AICCELERATE Pilot 1 for predicting length of stay and complications after the surgery

referenceTimePoints.description: The time period between the end of first surgical operation and the discharge time is divided into 1h periods. However if patient has complications then these event times are considered as anchor points and reference time points are calculated accordingly. Two complications with less than 8 hour is assumed same complication so no reference time point is picked within this period. Enumeration for reference time points start from 1 hour before the complications

secondaryTimePoint.name: lastSurgeryTime
secondaryTimePoint.description: Time of the latest main surgery performed in the episode

filter.name: isMainSurgery
filter.description: If procedure is main cardiac surgery

feature.name: age
feature.description: Age of the patient at that time

feature.name: hasSurgeryBefore
feature.description: Whether patient has cardiac surgery before this operation in his/her medical history

feature.name: exists
feature.description: Whether any complication occurs in the last 8 hours

feature.name: code
feature.description: Number of unexpected ICU admissions until now

feature.name: exists
feature.description: Whether any complication occurs in future

feature.name: minutesUntil
feature.description: Number of minutes until first complication

feature.name: exists
feature.description: Whether any unexpected ICU admission occurs in future

feature.name: minutesUntil
feature.description: Number of minutes until first unexpected ICU admission

combinedFeature.name: complication_n1_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a complication in the next hour

combinedFeature.name: complication_n2_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a complication in the next 2nd 1-hour period

combinedFeature.name: complication_n3_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a complication in the next 3rd 1-hour period

combinedFeature.name: complication_n4_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a complication in the next 4th 1-hour period

combinedFeature.name: complication_n5_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a complication in the next 5th 1-hour period

combinedFeature.name: complication_n6_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a complication in the next 6th 1-hour period

combinedFeature.name: complication_n7_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a complication in the next 7th 1-hour period

combinedFeature.name: complication_n8_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a complication in the next 8th 1-hour period

combinedFeature.name: unexpectedICU_n1_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a unexpected ICU in the next hour

valueExpr.fhirPath: minutesUntilComplication > 0 and minutesUntilComplication <= 60 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) > 0 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) < 480

combinedFeature.name: unexpectedICU_n2_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a unexpected ICU in the 2nd next 1-hour period

valueExpr.fhirPath: minutesUntilComplication > 60 and minutesUntilComplication <= 120 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) > 0 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) < 480

combinedFeature.name: unexpectedICU_n3_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a unexpected ICU in the 3rd next 1-hour period

valueExpr.fhirPath: minutesUntilComplication > 120 and minutesUntilComplication <= 180 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) > 0 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) < 480

combinedFeature.name: unexpectedICU_n4_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a unexpected ICU in the 4th next 1-hour period

valueExpr.fhirPath: minutesUntilComplication > 180 and minutesUntilComplication <= 240 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) > 0 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) < 480

combinedFeature.name: unexpectedICU_n5_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a unexpected ICU in the 5th next 1-hour period

valueExpr.fhirPath: minutesUntilComplication > 240 and minutesUntilComplication <= 300 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) > 0 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) < 480

combinedFeature.name: unexpectedICU_n6_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a unexpected ICU in the 6th next 1-hour period

valueExpr.fhirPath: minutesUntilComplication > 300 and minutesUntilComplication <= 360 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) > 0 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) < 480

combinedFeature.name: unexpectedICU_n7_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a unexpected ICU in the 7th next 1-hour period

valueExpr.fhirPath: minutesUntilComplication > 360 and minutesUntilComplication <= 420 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) > 0 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) < 480

combinedFeature.name: unexpectedICU_n8_w1h_any
combinedFeature.description: Whether patient has a unexpected ICU in the 8th next 1-hour period

valueExpr.fhirPath: minutesUntilComplication > 420 and minutesUntilComplication <= 480 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) > 0 and (minutesUntilUnexpectedICU - minutesUntilComplication) < 480
